languages.text: "Господь-Император, какая скука! Хоть бы поругаться с кем-нибудь".

traits.locale_text: "Господь-Император, какая скука! Хоть бы поругаться с кем-нибудь".

languages.text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."
languages.original_text: "Господь-Император, какая скука! Хоть бы поругаться с кем-нибудь".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."
"Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."
"Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."
"Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

languages.text: “帝皇在上，我要无聊死了！我真想找人干一架。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，我要无聊死了！我真想找人干一架。”

languages.text: «¡Por el Emperador, menudo aburrimiento! Ojalá pudiera liarme a golpes con alguien».
languages.original_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el Emperador, menudo aburrimiento! Ojalá pudiera liarme a golpes con alguien».

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下、あまりにも退屈だ！誰かに絡みたくてしかたないのに」
languages.original_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下、あまりにも退屈だ！誰かに絡みたくてしかたないのに」

languages.text: « Au nom de l'Empereur, je m'ennuie tellement que j'ai presque envie d'aller chercher la bagarre rien que pour tuer le temps. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Empereur, je m'ennuie tellement que j'ai presque envie d'aller chercher la bagarre rien que pour tuer le temps. »

languages.text: "Beim Imperator, mir ist ja so langweilig! Ich würde zu gerne Streit mit jemandem anfangen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Imperator, mir ist ja so langweilig! Ich würde zu gerne Streit mit jemandem anfangen."

languages.text: "İmparator efendimiz aklıma mukayyet olsun, öyle sıkıldım ki! Birileri çıkıp gelse de kavga etsek."
languages.original_text: "Lord Emperor, I am so bored! I'd love to pick a fight with someone."

traits.locale_text: "Lord İmparator aklıma mukayyet olsun, öyle sıkıldım ki! Birileriyle kavga etmek için can atıyorum."
